The Kingstide is offering choice of three-courses for $55/person. Home Main content starts here, tab to start navigating Slide 1 of 7 Slide 2 of 7 Slide 3 of 7 Slide 4 of 7 Slide 5 of 7 Slide 6 of 7 Slide 7 of 7 hero gallery paused, press to play images slides Playing hero gallery, press to pause images slides Our Food The Kingstide’s menu showcases a variety of seafood dishes thoughtfully prepared in both raw and wood-fired styles. Ingredients are sourced from trusted local partners and purveyors, reflecting the best of the Lowcountry’s coastal waters and farms. Designed as a gathering place for Daniel Island and the surrounding community, The Kingstide offers a welcoming space to connect, celebrate, and enjoy the flavors of the region. View Menu Order Online Place your order for pickup today. Order Now Private Events Host your next special occasion with us. Learn More Coastal-inspired, Ingredient-driven We look forward to seeing you soon!
